title: Sion has come to end us all

I've owned both champions for a long time, and I was {{champion:122}}  in a game today against {{champion:14}} , neither of us had any ganks, he was very good at zoning me from farming and I could only get a kill when I had my ult, and even when I got the kill his passive would get me because I would always fail to take in to account an escape route, minion wall op. In my honest opinion the new Sion beats Darius

Now if only Sion's lore was actually a story about what happened to Sion rather than this massive jumble of random garbage. Srsly I was hoping to read about how Sion overthrew Jarvan I and how he became this reanimated monstrosity, but instead I ended up barely being able to read the lore because the entire thing is "Blood. I follow. BLOOD. Meow"
